website_summaries.verdict: High-end boomboxes that sport a cassette recorder are hard to come by, but its sound virtualizer and premium audio quality are worth your consideration, as well.
pros: Built in cassette player, CD player, AM/FM radio with digital tuner, and MP3 player
cons: A little pricey, but it includes plenty of great features

customer_reviews.title: I don't like making bad reviews but i'm so disappointed with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like making bad reviews but i'm so disappointed with this boombox. First of all right out of the box the cover for the cassette wouldn't stay closed. I thought no big deal that's not worth sending it back. I just taped it down. The C.D. player works pretty good. I tried plugging my ipod in and the right speaker was so scratchy that i couldn't listen to it. I tried plugging in a USB flash drive that i downloaded music on, a 2 and a 16gb none of that music worked. I paid allot of money for this thing. Not real happy with it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Lbnewell

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great CD player. Great sound. Good operation button set up. However, it tracks poorly. Skips on all CDs I tried. I liked it enough that I bought another hoping it was better. It was not. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: MK MCMILLION

customer_reviews.title: I am Dissapointed, CD tray will not close after 3 weeks of purchase
customer_reviews.text: 10/2/17 - Update: 2 weeks after my initial review good review of this product, the cd tray broke down. When I inserted a cd and press close button, the cd tray will not stay close, it opens right back up. Now I cannot play any CD on this boombox because the tray will not stay close. I have retuned this back to Amazon. Very disappointing that brand new product will just break down within 3 weeks of purchase. That tells you a lot about the quality of this product. If I am able to get my money back from Amazon, I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Christianna Aderonke Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with non working cassette players on 2 different boomboxs
customer_reviews.text: received the boombox. It looked very nice. speakers sounded good. When we tried a cassette, it played it distorted. We checked the cassette in another player, which sound great. We exchanged the boombox, when the 2nd one arrived, the cassette player did not work on that one also. Returned the boombox and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a great unit but beware of the voltage conversion needed to use 110 volt electrical supply.
customer_reviews.text: This model has to be converted from 220 volt to 110 volt using a flat head screwdriver. This is achieved by looking on the back of the unit ha through a tiny recessed space and which it makes it very difficult to see and press down .The screw head was moved with great difficulty from a 3 o clock to a five o clock position not six o clock. i am scared to use the power cord in case the unit will then be damaged. can anyone answer this question for m am i using the battery power and i appreciate the excellence of the unit.It would be a five star review except for this problem
customer_reviews.author: rexin

customer_reviews.title: Top-end boombox/poor battery compartment.
customer_reviews.text: It took two deliveries to get a working unit.Panasonics' packaging leaves a little to be desired. Unit sounded good.Selectable EQ can be modified by use of the tone controls.Wide adjustability.Overall,a good sounding boombox,with adequate volume. Where this boombox fails miserably,is in the battery compartment.Don't be surprised if you break off the metal piece on the opposite end of the spring tensioning.I was trying to load the (8) "c" batteries,when this clip broke.No way to repair and have now lost the ability to operate without a power cord. Be sure not to have batteries installed ,if you plan on using the power cord.The unit and conversion plug both get VERY hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P. Quayle

customer_reviews.title: Awful FM Tuner - Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving a great boombox. It is well built, attractive, and the sound is just fine, however the FM tuner is just awful. I live in a major media market of 6 million people, just 25 miles from downtown of one of the largest cities in the US....and the FM tuner would only tune in clearly 4 FM stations! My 6 inch long $20 clock radio in my bedroom has better FM reception than this unit. I expected much better from Panasonic. Being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 220V unit that will come with a US adapter attached! Doesn't play CD's correctly!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap this unit is!!!! I'm sorry that I didn't notice anywhere that this is a 220V unit that will come with a cheap adapter. Right out of the box, the unit couldn't even play a European CD (and it's a 220V unit with a European plug!). The CD (which is a purchased authentic EU CD) skipped, got stuck on songs and played them incoherently!!! CRAP!!! I AM SO MAD AT THIS WASTE OF TIME AND EXPENSIVE CRAP. Wal-Mart sells this crap for $60!!! And US plug too! The sound....so poor too!!! KEEP YOUR MONEY AND DON'T TRUST AMAZON (I mainly bought this because it's Panasonic, seemed well priced and also "Amazon's Choice")!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MIT

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money-dual voltage not set for USA and extremely awkward process to change.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use after surgery and very disappointed to receive unit set for non-USA voltage. I have other dual voltage products that are very simple to change however this unit requires changing by a screwdriver inserted into a deeply recessed hole in the bottom of the unit where it is impossible to see and to make it more challenging instead of a metal or hard switch it is soft plastic. At this point I have no idea what voltage it is set on and not able to return. Items sold in USA should have USA voltage as a default.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even express how happy I am that I finally purchased this. I use it daily.... Mostly for my CD's. Sound quality is great. I also fall asleep most nighs listening with headphones. It has everything I could ask for including the BONUS of being able to re-listen to some old dearly loved cassette tapes that I could never bring myself to throw away. The thing is, I wasted so much time reading and comparing reviews from this and other brands and getting confused with the reviews that seemed critical that I ALMOST didn't order it at all!!! What a BIG MISTAKE that would have been!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Eckhardt Coaching

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Most of my appliances are and have been Panasonic, which I've always considered *the* quality brand. But this unit has disappointed mightily. First the antenna broke off. Then the radio refused to play. Now CD playback is becoming wonky -- all over a period of a few years. My old Sony boombox lasted more than ten years, had better sound quality, and was more solidly put together. I realize boomboxes are becoming obsolete, and that qualify has declined, but this unit -- not cheap -- has been a waste of money, and needs to be replaced: with a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Jill N. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit primarily to play my old cassette tapes. I am very pleased with the way it performs as well as with the sound quality - the tapes sound better than ever. One small problem though - I was looking for a unit with auto-reverse, and noticed that someone asked if this unit has that feature. The reply was "yes". Well, this unit does not have auto-reverse. To be sure, in the description there is no mention of the unit having this feature. It's ok though, units with auto-reverse are more prone to have tracking issues.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Cs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound, Plenty of Power for a good sized room.
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a box we had on the kitchen counter. The old one had decent sound and we could play it until our ears hurt. Bought a Sony 4330348736 here on Amazon, what a piece of junk, probably a knockoff, didn't really have a name for it. Put that in the garage and went for this Panasonic and was pleasantly surprised by the unit. Nice sound, some equalizer adjustments to suit you hearing or lack there of, and plenty of power. Will definitely fill a large room with sound if you need it to. Surprisingly heavy for its size, that may mean a good Amp, not sure. Will Update if anything changes my feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Durrock

customer_reviews.title: Yes if ur a Techie
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to set up instructions said made for tropical countries made in Indonesia Have AC power in N.J. hard to get at adjustment to change voltage will have to pay some to do for me. Nice size think it will have quality sound.. four stars for looks. And Panasonic name. Bought on price want good sound only want to use on AC. Hard to get a read om what factory set is? Thank u those who gave me a description on looks and size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerjoanne

customer_reviews.title: Won't tune in radio stations
customer_reviews.text: The radio stations will not tune in to the exact stations. It jumps 9 numbers at a time. For instance, for 740 am I have to have it on 738 or 747, either way it is not good reception. JUST FOUND OUT THIS IS A EUROPEAN MODEL AND THAT IS WHY THE STATIONS WON'T TUNE IN. VERY UNHAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K.

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic will not back the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Love the capabilities of this Boombox but didn't have a chance to enjoy them. The right front speaker does not work and I have only had it for about eight months now. Supposedly this boombox comes with a one year warranty, but Panasonic no longer sells this item so they will not cover it or pay for any repairs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN KOESTER

customer_reviews.title: I will NEVER purchase another Panasonic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $137.98 on October 4, 2018. The digital display failed the first week of August 2019. Since it was before one year the Square Trade warranty I purchased doesn't apply. This is the reply I received from Panacare: "Unfortunately due to the age of the unit we cannot do any repairs. There would be no repair center that you can send the unit to for repair. We apologize for the inconvenience this matter may cause." Agent 5 Panasonic McAllen Texas Service Center 4900 George McVay Drive Suite B Door 12 McAllen, Tx 78503 8:00 AM – 4:30 PM CST Direct # 956-683-2930 Fax # 956-668-8055
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: This model is not intended for North America--it works anyway
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality; love the ease of operation for CD's and cassette tapes; like the looks; not especially pleased with using size C batteries; as this model is not for North America I could not register it with Panasonic; also the radio tuner is a bit strange in that the AM frequencies do not quite match-up with USA ( e.g. 1430AM shows as 1431AM but it does work; have not used the remote so have no opinion.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Within a week after the "return window" closed, this box of crap wont open the cd drawer. I want to have a refund for this rip-off. Amazon is weak for so many reasons these days. I will find other ways to purchase stuff, otherwise I will do without.
customer_reviews.author: Rextrent

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy.  I was sold a used product that does not work properly.  Not a NEW item as purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Once again, amazon sold me a used product that does not work properly. I opened the worn box, plugged it in, placed a brand new cd in to test and it began to skip. Repeatedly at times. Not a good sign at all. I will no longer purchase electronic items through amazon. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Xander Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this 2 years ago and has held up good. We just used too much on our back ...
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased this 2 years ago and has held up good. We just used too much on our back deck patio. With purchasing the new one, I have to say bravo!!! for the better adapter to use in the electrical outlet for U.S. customers. LOL, we don't have to tape it to the 2 prong one anymore!!! Thank you 7-18-17 Update: The adaptor got too hot but the biggest issue a defect in the CD drawer open and close. So returned for refund. We really liked this boombox as our first one was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound; tuner average
customer_reviews.text: Higher power and better sound than many boom boxes. Works well on CD and tape. FM tuner not as powerful as I had hoped using the standard telescoping antenna or my cheap dipole antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Somebodynoz

customer_reviews.title: The Panasonic Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: Well if you are technically inclined you will not have a problem. I for one am not. I needed to call Tech Support for help getting a station. Also I didn't buy it for the MP3, Casset player and CD player. I just wanted to hear music. All that is fine. I especially like the size and the size of the speakers had me very excited. I want to thank Tech Support for their help.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Torres

customer_reviews.title: Neither worked
customer_reviews.text: I’m an elementary music teacher and I bought one of the CD players for school and one for my home. I had bought the exact same model several years previously and was happy with its performance. This time, however, neither CD player would read any of my CDs (These were original CDs not compilations). Also, the plugs were both rigged with an adaptor which was not the case previously. I can not recommend this product, it is defective. I returned both units for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: musiclady

customer_reviews.title: This is an old time/new radio sound system/tape/CD player
customer_reviews.text: I really use all three features, radio especially, old time tape player, (I have a few) and CD player, (a lot). In the area where I live, radio reception is poor - I listen to Public Radio FM - (it doesn't even come in on a Boze sometimes) so I wasn't surprised that it didn't come in clearly on this panasonic. However, the instructions were difficult, for me, to understand, like preset stations. I now use the manual settings. There is no clock. The CD doesn't repeat (or I can't figure out how to get it to). But, I'm glad I have it all its possibilities for background "noise" as I do my art work.
customer_reviews.author: Job Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality worse than my small bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this boombox for listening cassette tapes that I made in 80s and 90s. Since reviews indicate good sound quality, I chose this. This boombox does not Dolby decode, i.e. it does not reproduce sound with original sound quality of the cassette tapes. CD and mp3 works, but the sound quality is far below my expectation. FM reception is also poor. I returned this to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroyuki Ikezi

customer_reviews.title: SOLID PORTABLE SYSTEM!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves it. Remote, CD player, bass and solid! The sound is exactly what he was looking for. He wanted it for a small room. But he wanted quality sound. A full sound. Tried other systems of this size. The sound of OTHER systems was cheap, tinny and hollow. This was the most bang for your buck. Mind you, we may be middle aged but we love music and it matters that whatever system we listen to produces great sound for that 70's soul! The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I have not had it long enough to see if its durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Tench

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY COMPARTMENT PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: I liked the functions of this device and it seemed to work well when plugged in, however the battery compartment was poorly designed. The AA batteries were difficult to install and the C cell batteries would not stay in place. The connection points on either end of the compartment were not properly aligned to keep the batteries in place. This resulted in the batteries popping out. For this reason I had to return this device.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY SOUND QUALITY FOR CLASSICAL MUSIC.
customer_reviews.text: Not really a "Boom box" with the extra bass, etc. My classical music sounded so incredible that it amazed me. As good as my full stereo system with four speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1 Portable Stereo ( but cassette player doesn’t work)
customer_reviews.text: We received it as promised! We’re excited to try it and both CD player and radio works ok. Sounds from CD is wonderful but radio is understandable coz of the reception. The sad part is the cassette player that doesn’t work at all! Will return or exchange!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing must have boombox!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This boombox lives up to Panasonic. If you enjoy cassettes then a positive plus. The tape deck is solid and seems very durable. Old tapes sound great! The CD and USB functions are easy and trouble free. The sound is not cheap. A full Panasonic experience. Always loved this brand. I hope they continue to manufacture these forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Wenderoth

customer_reviews.title: Love this box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a slightly updated version of the old boom box. It is very easy to use, though weighs more that my old one. But the sound is good for a 'box' and I am very pleased with it. Have not used the remote yet. But I think it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Uhh huffed f2f hy

customer_reviews.title: Cool Boombox
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit because my old one finally started wearing; CD player and sound was going bad. I am very pleased with this unit. It is attractive, easy to use and the sound is wonderful. I use it in the kitchen mainly when I'm cooking or cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This model exceeded my expectations and puts out some quality sound when you use its "sound virtualizer" function. It makes the different frequencies come out in full clarity. I also like the preset EQ and how easy the program function is to use/program. Another plus about this model is its lightness which is quite notable when u carry it, although one thing I particularly enjoy is that when playing CD's, they won't skip if u are carrying it as is usually the case with most boom boxes that have the CD player on top.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounds, BOSE can keep their money
customer_reviews.text: Un-frigging believable unit! I had to read the detailed operators manual to play USB right after plugging it in and was totally blown away with the fidelity and volume of my purchase, the lows boom and the highs soar. It’s twice a heavy as much larger units so it’s a solidly built unit with enough controls to make your average audiophile happy, and I haven’t even started on EQ settings yet. I’m very excited with my Panasonic RX-D55GC-K and would recommend this highly to anyone except those that feel it’s necessary to spend more than $150 to get quality sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Old Submariner

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: My original boombox lasted 13 years. 13 years!!! I spent $80 on it. This was around $117. This boombox stopped working in 2 years. Bought it in 2016. HUGE disappointment. Maybe everything is made to break or stop working within 2 years now. Quality of all products is way down. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: ska

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: After buying this from another seller and finding that the cassette player didn't work I was disappointed. When I saw it on sale through another seller I was uncertain. The first one was from VCT electronics. The second one came from New Era Electronics. The packaging on both was good. When I got the second unit I was pleased to find that it worked as stated. I am now able to enjoy music I haven't been able to hear in years. Thank you New Era Electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, esp for someone to use in the shop/shed ...
customer_reviews.text: returned something else to walmart. This beats all. Sound is great, esp for someone to use in the shop/shed with hearing aids. Lots of base and clarity. CD tray is a little flimsy; just need to take caution. There were complaints that the US plug was not in it, so I bought one with it. Well, it was indeed in it, and the setting was also already on 110. Its compact, and I dont consider it weighty like others say. We dont plan on lugging it around town.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: 2 hours in and had problem with product
customer_reviews.text: I called Panasonic for their "customer support" and got the run around. They told me to contact their "global" support number and got no help from them as well. After 2 hours and becoming super aggravated and having a family friend look at it, I decided to return this item and will never purchase another Panasonic product again!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Lauff

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my garage, and it can fill the garage easily with sound. The bass is good for a portable radio. I have it on a shelf away from reach so the handheld controller works well. Even if I am working outside the garage, in the driveway, the sound carries well out there without any distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep it, but I find the design a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it, but I find the design a bit awkward. The light cannot be dimmed or brightened and when the room is dark you can't see the markings on the buttons and the backlit display print is too thin to see well. The receiver sensitivity is adequate for the one station I listen to, but the high-end of the treble range has a buzz to it which indicates a weak sigfnal. I stopped trying to figure out how to test the alarm settings, so I can't trust it to work right. For time and alarm, I spent $12.00 for a separateclock.
customer_reviews.author: Flamecooler

customer_reviews.title: Quickly became useless
customer_reviews.text: Checked it out as soon as it arrived. Seemed wonderful! Sounded great and everything worked. Two months later the display panel only indicated a few random lines, which renders the whole thing useless. Through Amazon I hooked up with a troubleshooter. I wrote "the display panel only indicates a few random lines". Their reply was "Can you be more specific"?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some good some problematic
customer_reviews.text: After studying the manual I found this works ok, but plug converter will always fall out. The sound recording from CDs to cassettes is good. But this would never play some cd's, and I'm not sure why. Number 1 in a set of cds would be fine and numbers 2 and 3 would always skip or catch. With quite a bit of use after 2 1/2 years the cd drawer goes in and out and will not play cds, in fact it goes in and out with a buzzing sound if anything: the radio or tape player is turned on. This after it was not touched or moved. I'm looking for another kind.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: sounds GREAT, Great Radio, Programing the channels well that took a bit. And if you don't put battery in for the memory part of the radio you lose your program stations. in witch this happens every time you unplug or loose power. over all great radio.
customer_reviews.author: KNN.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a good price. Love that is plays MP3 CDs as well as MP3s on a USB drive. The remote control is a wonderful feature also.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: For a portable player, the sound is great and it's lightweight enough to carry it with you outdoors while you're working in your yard or on a project. This is my second one, I returned the first one as it was defective. I would have given it 5 stars but was disappointed in the a/c plug. It is European and they give you an adapter for the USA. It should be manufactured with USA plug.
customer_reviews.author: Deeskie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing initially setting the voltage on the bottom of the unit. Not crazy about the voltage adapter so I ordered the American cord. Sound is good. Has features I won’t use but others in my family may. It’s light and sounds good outdoors
customer_reviews.author: deb from Mi

customer_reviews.title: POWER MANAGEMENT - GOOD. REMOTE CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: FEATURES: CASSETTE, CD, AM/FM RADIO ALL OK. POWER MANAGEMENT - GOOD. REMOTE CONTROL: GREAT IDEA SINCE I CAN CHANGE STATIONS WHEN A COMMERCIAL COMES ON. ERGO CONTROLS: BAD. ONE BUTTON FOR ON/OFF. SEPARATE BUTTONS FOR OTHER FUNCTIONS: RADION, CD PLAYER, ETC. SIMPLIFY STATION PRESETS SIMILAR TO AUTOMOBILES. HOW HARD IS THAT?
customer_reviews.author: Jerome I. Ussery

customer_reviews.title: second hand/used giving me trouble
customer_reviews.text: This might be more about the person who sold this machine than the machine itself. My old Panasonic RX_D55GC boom box died after many years of faithful service. I didn't HAVE to replace it with the exact machine, but I did when I saw this for sale. It has a remote control and not too much new technology. Using it predominantly for CD audio books, this machine makes or allows the CDs to skip horribly! I tested the pics on my car CD player. No skips. So, I am disappointed more in the person who sold this on Amazon. The rest of the features work well.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Matuga

customer_reviews.title: Portability and great sound !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portable music player ! I've only had it two days and am very pleased with it . I needed a portable player that would play various types of stored music and this is it . I can carry this into the garage and play an MP3 disc, which I have a load of ,or play music on a USB plug in and not have to keep adding music when a standard CD plays out. The remote , which is as large as a TV remote , will reach over 20 feet and offers so many options. You have so many options for adjusting the sound...it's great ! The sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Boombox for home use, playing cd's. The sound quality is truly outstanding for such a compact unit and convenient price ! Is convenient to move around the house. Incidentally, the unit does come with a power cord, having both US and European two prong plug adaptors. Highly recommend this player with its compact convenience and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The King of Boom Boxes
customer_reviews.text: This boombox, designed for both domestic and foreign use, is solidly built and projects a clean and clear sound. It is heavier than the typical boombox due to the quality of construction. I've not used the tape player and in fact, would have preferred its omission and more money put into sound reproduction or larger speakers. Still, voices are clear and the structural integrity allows high volume without distortion. This is the best boombox I've heard and my last entertainment system cost over $20K. I found this quite acceptable for its size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Great device for playing CDs and tapes and would suggest to anyone who has a bunch of discs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. It plays CDs which are almost impossible to get now that everything is digital and it plays tapes which are ancient and you can't buy anywhere. It does play MP3s, but I wish it played WAV files also because they have a better sound quality if recorded correctly. I would give it five stars except for that one issue. I haven't tried the remote, but it should work fine. It also has a strange connector with the plug which I don't understand. It does have wonderful stereo sound which I love. Anyway that is my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Okon

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my home office.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this Panasonic boom box. Just what I was looking for. FIts on a bookshelf. CD changer slides out, not on top.
customer_reviews.author: L Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: This unit was faulty. It would not play a cd. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Smolka

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio was purchased and shipped overseas. This radio is worthless. It did not work with "C" battery, did not work on 110 electric current and did not work on 220 electric current. Money spent on this radio was money down the drain. The worthless radio is no loner here but the money should be refunded. Thank you for nothing. Donald
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Bad Remote
customer_reviews.text: My remote control stopped working. Put in new batteries still won't work, bought a new remote still won't work, I think the sensor on the radio died. There are some functions you can only do with the remote, so this is a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: bearcat6

customer_reviews.title: Boom Box Bomb
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this radio due to the extreme amount of static I encountered. I believe it's my location that causes the static, since I live very close to an airport and mountains. So I'm sure this is an excellent radio, but due to my location, I cannot get quality reception.
customer_reviews.author: Blacksheep9er

customer_reviews.title: Better than a clock radio?
customer_reviews.text: I am not comparing this to expensive component system, but to other boomboxes I have owned, and it does not match up. The bass is lacking and the reception is very poor. I get better reception with two different stereos located in the same spot in the house. Might be worth 49.95. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for a small player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for a small player. The sound virtualizer option really makes this sound like the music is playing live in my room. It's got a lot of features, great sound, and a good remote control. I only wish this could play multiple DVDs, but am just happy to still be able to find something that includes a cassette player and DVD, as well as the radio and USB port. I'm a professional musician, so my music collection includes a wide variety of media and this player makes it possible for me to listen to all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality portable player
customer_reviews.text: This held up to its advertised description. It came with everything it said it would and is a sturdy, quality made stereo which makes me happy. The only thing I wish, is that it had an am receiver. I want to be able to tune into am channels but just can't get a good signal and I live in a city. My car gets am just fine but not this. Oh and it's nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina V.

customer_reviews.title: No resume or fast forward
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the unit for a week. It has great sound. I listen to lectures on CDs. Unfortunately, you cannot fast forward or resume like you can in the MP3 player in your car or a DVD player. This is an issue because I have to listen to the whole lecture in one sitting. You can pause it and come back but you have to leave the unit on. I don't want to leave it on all day until the next time. The radio is only average in my location. I think a better antenna would help.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gilbert Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for its great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a compact CD player with good sound. More importantly hoped it would be strong enough to pull in my local public radio classical music station. It's fantastic. Perfect for my apartment. First player that could pull in the radio station. Sound is awesome. Also like the open and close mechanism for playing CDs. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: bsr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio with good sound and the remote is a real bonus. Has all the functions we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Babboni

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today
customer_reviews.text: But have a hard time reading the small print in the instruction booklet. So far do like it very much. I have not done some things like clock etc. on it, but have to do a bit at a time as I have a hard time with the small print on the instructions. I just did the clock and NOT a fan of "24 hour" clocks, but got it right today.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dexter

customer_reviews.title: The CD function was not working at all! It stops every few seconds of playing.
customer_reviews.text: I like the USB function which is the only thing I'm using now due to the defective CD function. I never had the chance to return it since the USPS is not that accessible from where I live. I have an APO address in NE Asia.
customer_reviews.author: Bles B.

customer_reviews.title: All-around quality boombox!
customer_reviews.text: This boombox has a very nice all-around quality to it. The sound is great in a smaller area, as in one room, and the cassette and the CD player both work excellently. The antenna provides clear radio reception and I have no complaints. This is a very good unit and highly recommend it as a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: babylac89

customer_reviews.title: Great Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and works awesome! Sounds great and love that it has all the features. Cassette, CD and AM/FM radio. Can plug in or use with batteries. Great boom box for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Krause

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY RETRO BOOM BOX
customer_reviews.text: HIGH QUALITY PLAYS MY OLD CASSETTE TAPES & CD'S (WHATS A CASSETTE AND WHATS A CD )?? HA JA LOL
customer_reviews.author: BILL NICOLEN

customer_reviews.title: It's a Panasonic! If they made cars I'd buy one!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it has such a "mature", clean look to it. Not something that belongs in my kid's room. This is an adult looking system, but it won't let the party down when it comes to sound. Another great product from a name that's been around a minute or two, and knows a thing or two about building great electronics. I even shave with a Panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very very happy with this boombox
customer_reviews.text: Although I was skeptical with a few of the reviews made. I am very very happy with this boombox. The sound is great, can play a whole bunch of cassettes that I can't find replacement for (have not been able to convert to CD just yet) and I can play my CD's and MP3 from my portable drive. Couldn't ask for anything else. I am so happy that purchased it. is also dual electricity so I can take it to Europe as well.!!! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Works and sounds Great!!
customer_reviews.text: It has excellent sound for it's size and I appreciate the fact that since you can't find for sale many Boom Boxes at all any more in the U.S. this one was available with a cassette player. I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Warbirds P40

customer_reviews.title: I liked it except for the power cord.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stereo. Liked how it had different forms of musical playback since I am older I still have my cassette collection. I love the remote feature. Big problem was the power cord. The power cord socket has fallen apart so I am worried about electrical shock from plugging it in. I have had the stereo for over six months. I have tried to order a replacement and it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good inexpensive boombox. Features a Radio, CD player and tape player, rare these days
customer_reviews.author: Edward W. Jewell III

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with scotch tape over the cassette door. ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with scotch tape over the cassette door. After I removed tape the door opened and it will not stay closed, thus explaining the tape. I doubt this is a design feature. Non of the tape functions work either. Very dissatisfied as this was a Christmas present to my parents so they could play old cassette tapes and CDs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Spangler

customer_reviews.title: It Packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this Panasonic RX-D55GC-K Boombox. I purchased this Boombox to use in my line dance class and it is GREAT! Great sound! I enjoy using the remote while dancing and giving instructions. I highly recommend this Panasonic Boombox without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: deltapearl21972

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: There are not a lot of options available anymore for a boom box that plays both cassettes and CDs. Very pleased with this one so far. Purchased it for my 94 year old father for Christmas. Unlike some that are light weight and cheaply made (& have buttons that are stiff and hard to push), this one has has more weight to it and seems more solidly built. Operation is pretty straight forward and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I like this CD Radio sound very much. Could make easier to set up programing. And put instructions to operate online also. I’m happy with overall purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth ing

customer_reviews.title: Everything it should be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after much research, and have always liked Panasonic products. I originally gave it a tentative 1 star because I couldn't figure out how (or if it was possible) to change the AM step frequency increment from its current 9Khz to 10Khz as needed here in the US. Fortunately, another poster posted the answer (it *is* possible). Furthermore, I then re-reviewed the documentation, something I'd already done several times without success, and this time saw the instructions on how to do it which I kept missing. I haven't tried its plug-in MP3-player capability but all the other features work fine and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Animation Fan

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a good deal. here it is ayear later and it ...
customer_reviews.text: A year ago I paid 156$ for it,I thought it was a good deal. here it is ayear later and it doesn;work''. It turned out to be a piece c--p, plus the electric converter got so hot it split. Shop around,if it needs a converter plug in," forget about it".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic RX-D55GC-K Boombox
customer_reviews.text: Received and removed it from the box. Read the instruction. Have it on a shelf in the garage. It is working great and makes thee time in the garage go bye.
customer_reviews.author: Papatom

customer_reviews.title: This one works, not like so much of the other throwaway items offered.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected, although this is not always what you get. This is nice, well made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Ample power and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I got this player so I could listen to music while doing yard work. Its 10 Watts RMS per channel can be heard well all over my backyard. You can set it for random play and it will pick up where you left off after powering down. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real radio reception, no powered antenna required!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent FM and AM reception. Impressive sound for size. Panasonic quality. In an era of expensive stereos that need powered antennas and a dead chicken hung from your chimney, this "boombox" offers excellent reception in both AM and FM bands and it comes with a handle, Onkyo cannot say that!
customer_reviews.author: RocketDoc

customer_reviews.title: A little on the heavy side....
customer_reviews.text: Using for water aerobics class...it's nice and loud, playing at half volume. It's a little heavy, but I would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AMNSBFL

customer_reviews.title: Almost sounds like my Bose.
customer_reviews.text: This sounds great and has the benefit of cassette tape player for oldsters like me who have a few of those left from back in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Dyott

customer_reviews.title: The sound of this radio is It sounds like mini component.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is excellent I like it. The sound is excellent have different sound to adjust. It Heavy, clear, soft , vocal and you can custom Bass and treble, have crisp high frequency in the treble and the bass have deep bass I like it. The USB work great I used flash drive 16 Gb and the sound is great. I would recommend to purchase this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: CD player doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Cassette player works, radio is fair, but CD player does not read disks, no product support through Panasonic website and no answer in manual , another waste of time through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: eileenwj

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless boombox.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I 1st tried to use this boombox after the period in which it could be returned for full refund and postage, return shipping cost was far too expensive. So it has been retired to a back closet shelf. Sound quality was very poor and response to any buttons was slow if at all. All buttons are too difficult to read unless one has his eyes close up to the boombox. Do not buy this one, there are other ones out there that really work as advertised! CP
customer_reviews.author: Claire P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect as a radio. Good sound quality. I put a rubber bank around the remote to help me find the right buttons in the middle of the night. One problem is that the time doesn't show well when the radio is not on because it is not lit. This makes it very hard to see during the day and impossible at night. This is not a big problem for me because we have other clocks. It was a bit of a challenge to program initially.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a player that could emphasis treble since I have a high frequency hearing loss and also would play my cassettes. I had to return a locally purchased one because of poor sound quality. I read the reviews on this Panasonic and ordered it. I and very happy with it. I adjusted the tone to my hearing and am delighted with the sound quality. I would rather that the plug for my XM receiver be iin the back rather than the front but I am sure that others like it where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie bruce

customer_reviews.title: Both devices sound great minus the useless power cord issue
customer_reviews.text: What I disliked about this product I Purchased three sent one back The first one arrived with the accessory attachment for one of its two enclosed power cords however the other two did not so each time one of the two power cords was useless because it did not have the accessory attachment to plug it into an electric socket fortunately it came with a conventional second power cord so the device can still be played but the power cord needing the attachment is useless
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Big clean sound.  Full featured.  Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Needed a successor to my very old and tired Sony boombox that I'd used as garage tunes. This unit has power! Big tunes! Many features that allow you to fine tune the sound, too. I'll follow up later with a full report, but my initial judgment is that this box rules, for its size. I almost bought the new Sony model, but read a review about puny speaker output and chose this one instead. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: T. Real

customer_reviews.title: Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: We use this out at our pool, Only got to use for a few months. I'll be taking this into the house soom and hopefully I'll get to experiment with it more. When I'm not as busy. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Madden

customer_reviews.title: buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this Boombox. I am recording an album and can listen via the mp3 or cd. It is getting real hard to find any decent cd players out there. I guess things are moving digital. But, I prefer a cd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does everything well and tuner reception is good (not easy north of Boston)
customer_reviews.text: Would get five stars if the design was not remote dependent. Otherwise, does everything well and tuner reception is good (not easy north of Boston). Does play mp3 USB drives and does so randomly if you choose. One can put several days of music on to play that way. Nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cogan

customer_reviews.title: Great little boombox.
customer_reviews.text: For a little boombox this one sounds really great. I am not a sound expert nor do I go in for super expensive speakers, but I feel the sound is very good. I just needed something for music when in my craft room and this certainly fits the bill and when turned up can be heard all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Boss

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It has really great sound but the cd player is very touchy - if you turn up the sound it skips - so overall I like it but the cd is not that great- radio is good
customer_reviews.author: patricia f.palumbo

customer_reviews.title: serves the purpose  i wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: glad to have a player for my old cassette tapes works well i'm very happy with sound quality for my purposes
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Degrave

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn’t control cassette tape
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a full function remote, but it’s not. This should be in description for all buyers to know.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

product_meta.title: Panasonic RX-D55GC-K Boombox  High Power MP3 CD AM/ FM Radio Cassette Recorder with USB & Music Port Sound with 2-Way 4-Speaker (Black)
product_meta.description: Panasonic's RX-D55 CD Radio Cassette Recorder is a 280W cassette recorder with USB and music ports and high quality sound with four 2-way speakers This boom box features natural surround and high quality sound with MP3 re-master and sound virtualize It plays CD CD-R/RW and MP3 has an AM/FM radio and a cassette recorder and comes with a remote control It comes with both a European plug and a US plug adapter
feature_bullets: High Quality Sound and High Power with 2-Way 4-Speaker and Big Size Speaker Box  280 W
Music Port on Front Panel for Digital Audio Player Playback. Natural Surround & High Quality Sound with MP3 Re-Master & Sound Virtualizer.
Speaker power rating of 10 watts per channel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars958 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
